text:
Ashok H. Desai (– 13 April 2020) was an Indian politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of India from 9 July 1996 to 6 May 1998. He also was the Solicitor General of India from 18 December 1989 to 2 December 1990. He was awarded the Padma Bhushan.
Desai died on 13 April 2020 at the age of 77.
